function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid urban population growth and high-rise density","Impact":"Increased risk of rapid disease transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures and improved healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Smart city technology for monitoring and management","People":"Urban residents, travelers, and commuters","Owner":"Local government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Sprawling suburban development","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling and managing contagion spread from outer areas to urban centers","Mitigation":"Invest in decentralized healthcare facilities and improved transportation infrastructure","Technologies":"Telemedicine and advanced transportation systems","People":"Suburban residents and commuters","Owner":"Local government and urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Global interconnectedness of cities","Impact":"Enhanced risk of rapid disease transmission through global flows of travelers, goods, and ideas","Mitigation":"Enhance international collaboration on pandemic preparedness and response","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing and communication systems","People":"Global travelers, expatriates, and international business professionals","Owner":"International organizations and government agencies"}]}
